title: Someone Borrowed
short_cast: Caio Castro, Thati Lopes, Patricya Travassos, Mariana Xavier, Fafá Rennó, Bruna Louise, Polliana Aleixo, Flávio Pardal, Arthur Kohl, Danielle Winits, Danilo de Moura

desc: To fulfill his mother’s dying wish and avoid being removed from her will, an inflexible bachelor hires an actress to play his fiancée.
